document.discussion_title: Skyline Group International Launches Leadership Coaching Technology Devoted to Women Leaders | EssentialsEcho
document.topic_text: Menu Skyline Group International Launches Leadership Coaching Technology Devoted to Women Leaders Sindell continues, “Leadership development fails women because it takes an all or nothing approach, but the key is balance.” SAN FRANCISCO, CA (PRWEB) August 22, 2016 Skyline Group International today announces the launch of Coaching for Women (C4W), a first-of-its-kind leadership development program designed for women. While women make up 53 percent of entry-level employees, there’s a serious lack of women leaders — a 2015 analysis published in the Journal of Applied Psychology found that women account for just 24 percent of senior vice presidents and 19 percent of c-suite executives. “Despite this statistic and others that demonstrate the divide between male and female leaders, the…
document.post: Menu Skyline Group International Launches Leadership Coaching Technology Devoted to Women Leaders Sindell continues, “Leadership development fails women because it takes an all or nothing approach, but the key is balance.” SAN FRANCISCO, CA (PRWEB) August 22, 2016 Skyline Group International today announces the launch of Coaching for Women (C4W), a first-of-its-kind leadership development program designed for women. While women make up 53 percent of entry-level employees, there’s a serious lack of women leaders — a 2015 analysis published in the Journal of Applied Psychology found that women account for just 24 percent of senior vice presidents and 19 percent of c-suite executives. “Despite this statistic and others that demonstrate the divide between male and female leaders, the…
